item.title: Programmer's Productivity
item.description: A meditative piece in which I explore the notion of productivity as applied to the craft of a software developer (and other such crap). Yesterday I spent twelve hours hunting down a most bizarre bug. I flipped through literally thousands of lines of code, I set dozens of breakpoints only to realize that those places were being hit hundreds of times, and it is virtually impossible to debug it that way.
